name: A thick molybdenum ring with agates
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
